name: Hide Admin Bar From Front End
author: Dev02ali

sections.description: Very simple and easy to use plugin for hiding admin bar from front end,
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder “admin_bar_hider” to “/wp-content/plugins/”

  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress

  3. Enjoy! as there is no setting for this.
sections.faq:
1. No technical skills needed.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the folder “admin_bar_hider” to “/wp-content/plugins/”

  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress

  3. Enjoy! as there is no setting for this.
sections.changelog: This is first version no known errors found
